vote.title: Authorize professional engineering services of engineer for architectural and engineering design and construction administration services for the replacement and modernization of the emergency back-up generator system at Dallas City Hall with M.E.P. Consulting Engineers, Inc. (MEPCE), the most highly qualified proposer of two - Not to exceed $1,030,200.00 - Financing: ARPA Redevelopment Fund
